creator: hans.schmid@einsurance.de
text:
It is just cosmetic, but Tomcat always tells me 

Stopping tomcat.
Stoping tomcat on ...

Note the missing 'p' in Stoping in the second line :)

Here the patch:

--- StopTomcat.java.orig	Sun Sep 23 06:49:58 2001
+++ StopTomcat.java	Wed Oct 10 14:51:18 2001
@@ -215,8 +215,8 @@
 
 	if( "".equals( secret ) )
 	    secret=null;
-		
-	System.out.println("Stoping tomcat on " + host + ":" +port +" "
+
+	System.out.println("Stopping tomcat on " + host + ":" +port +" "
 			   + secret);
 	InetAddress address=null;
 	if( host!=null && !"".equals( host )) {


Regards,
Hans Schmid

creator: hans.schmid@einsurance.de
text:
Created attachment 657
Patch also removing whitespaces at some line endings

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
Thanks for the patch.  It will be applied for 3.3.1.  Things were too far
along to slip it into 3.3.

I was overly restrictive about updates during voting on RC2.  This change
is certainly safe enough.
creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
